tips.1: When a wolf dies, his identity is revealed to the other players
tips.2: The gunner, the witch, the jailer are the only way for the village to kill the fool
tips.3: If the icon of a role has a brown background, the player's role is publicly known

status.1: Waiting for other players to join, Room:

intro.title: Welcome to my own version of werewolves game
intro.additionalInfo: The game is played in real time with a chat room, specific roles, and a voting system. The game can be played by multiple users or computers in real time thanks to server-side WebSockets.

loading.info: It may take about 50 seconds when you first connect. Refresh the page if nothing changes.

intro.betterExperience: For a better experience, play with full screen mode! ğŸ‘†

connected.title: Connected Players List
connected.nousers: There are no users connected currently

join.noroom: There are no rooms to join currently
join.selectRoleDescription: Choose a role for this game, or leave it random.

create.roomCreatedWaitingUsers: The room has been created...and is waiting to be populated with remaining users.
create.preferredRoleDescription: Choose your preferred role for this game. Other players will choose their roles when they join.

error.numberOfPlayers: (The number of players should be between 2 and 16.)
error.CPUNbrNotPossible: The CPU number is not correct.
error.giveRoomName: You have to give a name to your room.
error.needAtLeastOnePlayer: You need at least one real player

info.numberOnEachRole: You can only choose 1 player max per role. But for the classic werewolf and the villager, you can add up a maximum of 3 each if you wish.
info.cpuExplanation: CPU players will automatically fill the remaining spots and play with AI.
info.preferredRole: As for now, only the room creator can choose his game role, we gonna enhance this feature soon
